entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 10 March 2023
